name: Outro
_source: speak;;You completed the map in 18 or less turns! You got the full reward!;;;hint
speak;;Unfortunately, you completed the map in more than 18 turns, so your reward will be reduced accordingly.;;;hint
speak;Marisa;Alright, we did it! Now for the final boss!
speak;Reimu;Took us long enough.|Everyone else usually goes down after two times!
speak;Marisa;So, what should we do with her, anyway?
speak;Reimu;Well, she could at least pay us back.|Oh! maybe she can be our tour guide for the rest of the way.
speak;Reimu;I'm self employed. I can show you a fifth time~.
speak;Youmu;I don't think interviewers usually threaten their applicants.
speak;Marisa;I don't think demanding workers keep their jobs long.
speak;Youmu;I guess that means I can't file any complaints.
speak;Reimu;What are you doing all the way back here?
speak;Mima;Just trying to keep myself warm.|Even spirits feel cold.
speak;Reimu;Wait, what is in your hands?
speak;Mima;Hmm... I'm bringing out an old spell of mine.|We're fighting tougher opponents.
speak;Reimu;And you didn't bother to pull it out earlier?
speak;Mima;You ask a lot of questions.
speak;Reimu;Whatever. Just finish what you're doing and join the others.|Marisa is asking about you.
